FRED2

Python Framework for Immunoinformatics

Start Using FRED2   or   View on GitHub

What is FRED2

FRED is a framework for T-cell epitope detection, and vaccine design. It offers consistent, and easy access to well established immunoinformatics methods.

Getting Started

The best way to familiarize yourself with FRED2 is by starting with our tutorials. The tutorials cover the basic functionality of FRED2.

Documentation

We spend a significant amount of efforts on documenting FRED2 functions and classes. You can find the documentation here.

Get Involved

Your favourite prediction method is missing? You discovered a bug, or just want to extend FRED2's functionality? Have a look at you tutorials for developers here.
